contentfulSermon.title: Ephesians: Week 6 - Understanding that You Can’t Understand... Understand?

fields.notesFormatted:
Luke 18:9-14

Ephesians 3:6

  1. Bigger God = Bigger worship. v. 14-16

  2. Pray also for spiritual growth. v. 17

  3. Prayer is primarily to change us not God.

  4. Understand that God’s love is too great to understand. v. 18

  5. Experience God’s love through His truth, spirit, & people.

  6. God chooses to work through you. v.20
